stance_1: I balance protein with vegetables and salad
stance_2: I eat beef, chicken, pork, and salmon regularly
justification: The interviewee explicitly discusses balancing protein (from meat) with vegetables and salad, showing that regular meat consumption is integrated into a balanced diet.

stance_1: I balance protein with vegetables and salad
stance_2: I enjoy the taste of beef and chicken
justification: Enjoyment of beef and chicken likely supports regular inclusion of these proteins in a balanced diet, though this is implied rather than directly stated.

stance_1: I balance protein with vegetables and salad
stance_2: I use dressings to enjoy white meat
justification: Using dressings to make white meat enjoyable supports including a greater variety of proteins in the balanced diet.
